700536f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Hoe Avenue
700536f-a.text:
Boston Road, east side, between Hoe Avenue and Vyse Avenue,
showing the entrance to what was formerly the Thomas Minford estate.
The buildings in the background are on the east side of Vyse Avenue.
July 31, 1928.
L. Sperr.
700536f-a.folder: Boston Road & Hoe Avenue, Bronx, NY
